text: læw hak phwk khea sraththa xyang thi phwk cea sraththa læw nænxn phwk khea k yxm di rab khx næana thi thuk txng læa hak phwk khea phinhlanghı nænxn phwk khea yxm xyu nı khwam tækyæk kan læ wxallxhˌ k ca thrng hı cea phx pheiyng kæ phwk khea læa phraxngkh nan pen phuthrng wi sung kar diyin thrng wi sung khwam rxbru
